xxl.applications.io
Class ContainerTest

java.lang.Object
  xxl.applications.io.ContainerTest

public class ContainerTest
extends Object

A simple class which tests containers, record managers, and so on. The test includes the test of the Strategy, the Page and the Record classes of the record manager. The objects inside the container have to support the equals operation.

Field Summary
static boolean activateBuffer
          A boolean flag determining whether the containers should be buffered during the test case.
static boolean activateCounterContainer
          A boolean flag determining whether the method calls to the tested container should be counted.

          The size of a block in this test case.

Method Detail

getReturnRSMD

public static ResultSetMetaData getReturnRSMD()
Part of the @link{TestFramework} which returns the relational metadata to the meassured values of a test run. These test values are stored inside a @link{TestFramework.list}.

Returns:
Here, the metadata for TimeForInsertion, TimeForRemoveQuarter and TimeForRemoveAllHalf are returned.

getTestValues

public static Iterator getTestValues(String fieldName)
Part of the @link{TestFramework} which has to produces test values for a variable declared above in this class.

Parameters:
fieldName - Name of a variable from above for which test values are wanted.
Returns:
An Iterator containing appropriate test values.
